title: Welcome to the e-version of Bhagavad Geeta

intro.para: This is an updated version of the work done by Dr. Preeti Shukla as a part of her Ph.D. research. The original version captures salient features of understanding Sanskrit poetry viz., पद-विभागः (word-separation), अन्वयः (sentence order), पद-परिचयः (word analysis), कारकसम्बन्धः (kāraka relations), सन्धि-विच्छेदः (sandhi-split) etc.

The current version follows Samsaadhanii's new tagging guidelines. Various कारकसम्बन्धः (Kāraka relations) are updated with some new relations for better understanding. Anvaya order is also the updated accordingly.
